name: Immortal Snail
description:
HTML5 DOES NOT WORK ON itch.io USE THIS LINK: https://games.mika.global/ImmortalSnail/

Someone offered you $10M and immortality a long time ago, and you accepted the offer. One caveat, some very intelligent immortal snail has gotten upset about it and wants to kill you and get the money back. Only one touch of the snail will take away your immortality and give you instant death.

Controllers: WASD

Objective: find the exit of the maze, and avoid the snail.

Number of levels: 11

Gun is only for moral support. 

OST: https://soundcloud.com/mika-pi/sets/ost-immortal-snail
